job.title: Dev Ops Engineer
job.description: Summary As an engineer in the System Firmware and Diagnostics Team, you will be part of a team building hardware-on-demand infrastructure and tools for use by developers across Apple. We build a product that enables remote development, control and testing of new hardware. We also develop tools for enhancing developer workflows, and automation pipelines for product development. Key Qualifications At least 5+ years hands-on experience in Continuous Integration and/or infrastructure engineering/DevOpsExcellent Python/ bash, and scripting fundamentalsExperience with cloud platforms such as AWS, GCE, Azure, or similarExperience with infrastructure-as-code tools such as Ansible, Chef, Terraform, or CloudFormationExperience with containerization and cluster management technologies like Docker and KubernetesKnowledge of build/release processes and CI/CD systems such as JenkinsGreat To Haves:Experience working in an agile software development lifecycleExperience with physical hardware lifecycle projects.Â (Proto, EVT, DVT, and PVT)Experience working within lab environmentsExperience managing external vendors is a huge plus.Experience with GitExperience with languages, tools, and frameworks for embedded systems and embedded systems testing is great to have (Make, gcc or clang tool chain, cunit, google test, clang static analysis, cppcheck, gcov, etc.) Description Working on core technologies you'll have the opportunity to make a major impact in the way that Apple develops, tests and manufactures all of its products. Our environment fosters product innovation, rapid product iteration and a liberating amount of autonomy. Education & Experience B.S. or higher in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or equivalent experience Role Number: 200265895
